item.title: Intergrated chat code problems
item.dc:creator: @newbiehacker newbiehacker
item.description:
@newbiehacker wrote:

try actually making it print the exception it catches after initializing the Socket.
this error looks like it’s happening because you’re trying to write to a Socket that hasn’t been initialized properly, so try and find out what that reason is.

Read full topic

item.title: Intergrated chat code problems
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

okay i got the code for the intergrated chat and i wrote the server and i wrote an external client to do the testing… now i want to put the client into the private server client

[code]
try{

                    s = new Socket("hybridscape.no-ip.org",786);
                    br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(
				s.getInputStream()));
		bw = new BufferedWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(
				s.getOutputStream()));
		Thread th;
		th = new Thread(this);
		th.start();
		
	}catch(Exception e){}[/code]

that is the code i use to connect to my chat server does anyone when i compile it its fine but when irun it comes up with errors anyone have any idea why

these are the errors:

Could Not Find C:\Documents and Settings\Silabsoft\Desktop\hybridscape*.java~*~

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error
at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source)
at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
at client.run(client.java:643)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Game saved for player silabsoft
[player-2]: silabsoft is already online.
Did not save for silabsoft

the errors only come up if the chatserver is online

Read full topic
